Title: Elephants Dream
Writer: Pepijn Zwanenberg (screenplay), Andreas Goralczyk (original concept), Bassam Kurdali (original concept), Ton Roosendaal (original concept), Andreas Goralczyk (scenario), Bassam Kurdali (scenario), Ton Roosendaal (scenario)
Plot: Emo and Proog are two men exploring a strange industrial world of the future.
